Own your memories

Textile is a digital wallet for your photos

We believe in a future where we each control our own data. Let's start with photos.

  • Sync

    Organize your photos across your devices or back them up remotely

  • Share

    Publish your photos to friends, family, or your favorite communities

  • Secure

    Your data is stored in a decentralized system designed to last forever

Join waiting list

Just enter and confirm your email. We're sending 100s of new invites each week.

Waiting list hosted on Product Hunt.

Decentralized Sharing

Just three steps from private, permissionless, decentralized photo sharing.

  • Download the app

    Find us in App Store and Google Play Store.

  • Take a picture

    Your photos will automatically sync across all your devices.

  • Share!

    Create private group threads where you can be yourself.

Built for your trust

  • Censorship resistant

    Textile is built on decentralized protocols for storage and sharing, helping to prevent any form of censorship.

  • Open source

    We believe transparency starts with our code, check it out today on GitHub. Build your own Textile release today.

  • Fully encrypted

    Your photos and messages are encrypted directly on your device, giving you complete control over your privacy and sharing.

  • Freely available

    Textile is freely available on the App Store and Google Play. We also publish our Android APK for anyone to install.

  • No ad tracking

    Textile doesn't have ads so we don't have any need to collect or monetize your data.

  • Censorship free

    Textile is built on decentralized protocols for storage and sharing, making it resistant to censorship.

  • Open source

    We believe transparency starts with our code, check it out today on GitHub. Build your own Textile release today.

  • Fully encrypted

    Your photos and messages are privately encrypted directly on your device, giving you complete control over your privacy and sharing.

  • Freely available

    Textile is freely available on the App Store and Google Play. We also publish our Android APK for anyone to install.

  • No ad tracking

    Textile doesn't have ads so we don't have any need to collect or monetize your data.

Technology matters

Textile is built on open source code, the IPFS protocol, and a mission to improve the future of our data. Are you ready to join us?

We are constantly writing about our work to create a more descentralized world. Check out our latest story.
